sentence.Network_en: It might, at last, silence the small but noisy intellectual clique.
sentence.Network_cn: 它可能最终会使这个聒噪的知识分子小圈子安静下来。

sentence.Network_en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentence.Network_cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

sentence.Network_en: At university, Taylor had fallen in with a small clique of literature students.
sentence.Network_cn: 在大学里，泰勒曾经频繁参与一个文学小团体的活动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, from Old French cliquer 'make a noise'; the modern sense is related to claque

encyclopedia.content: clique的意思 clique的意思就是 小圈子 私团 一般是指学校中学什们之间关系好的一些学生的小团队~ 有时也会有圈子战争电影 the clique ★片名★：The Clique ★译名★：女校风波、奥克特私立女子中学 ★年代★：2008 ★国家★：美国 ★类别★：喜剧 ★语言★：英语 ★字幕★：N/A ★片长★：87 Mins ★分级★：USA:PG ★导演★：迈克尔·莱拜克 Michael Lembeck ★上映日期★：2008年11月11日 美国 ★主演★： ★Elizabeth McLaug

entry.def: If you describe a group of people as a clique, you mean that they spend a lot of time together and seem unfriendly towards people who are not in the group.

example.ex: Anna Ford recently hit out at the male clique which she believes holds back women in television.
example.tran: 最近，安娜·福特对她认为阻碍了女性在电视业发展的男性集团进行了猛烈抨击。

means.word_mean: 1. an exclusive circle of people with a common purpose

auth_sentence.content: I was in the largest clique in my school.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was in the largest clique in my school.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was in the largest clique in my school.

auth_sentence.content: It's a self-congratulatory clique and cliques can delude themselves.

sentences.en: If the renegade clique of that country were in power,it would have meant serious disaster for the people.
sentences.cn: 如果那个国家的叛徒集团一得势,人民就要遭殃。

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂。

sentences.en: All traitorous persons and cliques came to no good end.
sentences.cn: 所有的叛徒及叛徒集团都没好下场。
